_comment: DCS SimpleRadio Standalone (SRS) — Pterodactyl egg for jaycadi/dcs-srs-server
name: DCS SimpleRadio Standalone (SRS) – jaycadi/dcs-srs-server
author: srs-egg@yourdomain.tld
description: Runs the DCS SimpleRadio Standalone server using the jaycadi/dcs-srs-server Docker image. Common settings are exposed as Panel variables; no manual server.cfg edits required. Default voice/data port is 5002 (TCP+UDP).

installation.script:
#!/bin/sh
# Prepare writable dirs for logs/cfg so the server folder isn't empty.
set -eu
mkdir -p /mnt/server/logs /mnt/server/cfg
echo "This server runs SRS via jaycadi/dcs-srs-server. Configure via Startup variables in the panel." > /mnt/server/README-SRS.txt
echo "Done."

variables.name: Time Zone
variables.description: TZ for the container (e.g., Etc/UTC, America/Los_Angeles).

variables.name: Server IP Bind
variables.description: IP address to bind. Use 0.0.0.0 to listen on all interfaces.

variables.name: SRS Voice/Data Port
variables.description: Primary SRS port (TCP+UDP). Set your server's Primary Allocation to this.

variables.name: Enable UPnP
variables.description: Attempt to auto-open port forwarding if the router supports UPnP.

variables.name: Enable HTTP REST API
variables.description: Start the HTTP management server (requires an additional TCP port allocation).

variables.name: HTTP REST API Port
variables.description: TCP port for the HTTP management server (only used if enabled). Assign as an Additional Allocation.

variables.name: Transmission Log Enabled
variables.description: Record radio transmissions to log files.

variables.name: Transmission Log Retention (days)
variables.description: Days to keep transmission logs before cleanup.

variables.name: Export Client List
variables.description: Write a JSON file with connected clients (useful for overlays/automation).

variables.name: Client Export File Path
variables.description: Where to write the clients list JSON file.

variables.name: Server Presets Enabled
variables.description: Push server-side channel presets to clients (requires preset files).

variables.name: LOS (Line-of-Sight) Enabled
variables.description: Limit radio range by terrain line-of-sight.

variables.name: Distance-Based Range Enabled
variables.description: Limit radio range by distance only.

variables.name: IRL TX Effects
variables.description: Apply realistic transmission effects to outgoing audio.

variables.name: IRL RX Interference
variables.description: Apply realistic interference to received audio.

variables.name: Radio Expansion
variables.description: Allow more than 10 presets per aircraft.

variables.name: Allow Radio Encryption
variables.description: Permit encrypted comms; does not force them.

variables.name: Force Encryption
variables.description: Require encryption for all radios.

variables.name: Show Tuned Count
variables.description: Display number of users tuned to each frequency.

variables.name: Show Transmitter Name
variables.description: Display the name of the transmitting user.

variables.name: Coalition Audio Security
variables.description: Prevent opposing coalitions from hearing each other.

variables.name: Disable Spectator Audio
variables.description: Stop spectators from hearing radio comms.

variables.name: External AWACS Mode
variables.description: Enable server-side radio management (External AWACS).

variables.name: External AWACS Password (BLUE)
variables.description: Password for BLUE team control.

variables.name: External AWACS Password (RED)
variables.description: Password for RED team control.

variables.name: Test Frequencies (MHz)
variables.description: Comma-separated list (e.g., 247.2,120.3).

variables.name: Lobby Frequencies (MHz)
variables.description: Comma-separated list for lobby (pre-mission).

variables.name: Retransmission Node Limit
variables.description: 0 = unlimited.

variables.name: Check for Beta Updates
variables.description: Enable beta update checks.
